Code and Data

Code

  • script9.3.py | Script to process caulobacter growth data and compute MLE’s with CI’s and AIC.

Data Sets

  • Tidyed data of caulobacter growth from Iyer-Biswas et al 2014. | (filetype: .csv)(240 kb)

Fig. 1: Bacterial growth across time.

Used to generate Figure 1 after running main() from script9.3.py.
